Undead Raven Swarm

A screeching cawing whirlwind of buffeting wings, clawing talons and pecking beaks.


Undead Raven Swarm

CR 9

XP 6,400
NE Tiny undead (swarm)
Init +6; Senses darkvision 60 ft., scent; Perception +24
DEFENSE
AC 16, touch 14, flat-footed 14 (+2 Dex, +2 natural, +2 size)
hp 105 (14d8+28 plus 14)
Fort +8, Ref +8, Will +13
Defensive Abilities half damage from piercing and slashing; Immune swarm traits, undead traits
Weaknesses swarm traits
OFFENSE
Spd 10 ft., fly 40 ft. (average)
Melee swarm (3d6 plus eye-rake plus disease)
Space 10 ft.; Reach 0 ft.
Special Attacks distraction (DC 18), eye-rake (DC 18)
STATISTICS
Str 2, Dex 15, Con -, Int 2, Wis 15, Cha 12
Base Atk +10; CMB -; CMD -
Feats Great Fortitude, Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Lightning Reflexes, Skill Focus (Perception), Toughness, Weapon Finesse
Skills Fly +10, Perception +24
ECOLOGY
Environment any
Organization solitary, unkindness (2-4 swarms), or murder (5-10 swarms)
Treasure none
SPECIAL ABILITIES
Disease (Su) Raven plague: Swarm-injury; save Fort DC 18; onset 1 day; frequency 1/day; effect 1d4 Con damage and 1d2 Str damage; cure 2 consecutive saves. The save DC is Charisma-based.

An undead raven swarm is a teeming mass of sinister, rotting, diseaseridden birds that seek to destroy any living creature encountered. A single undead raven appears as a rotting and diseased black bird whose feathers are torn, matted and dirty. Its eyes are inky black.

Undead raven swarms are found in desolate forests, on desolate plains or moors, or in haunted caves and mountains.
